ygData.subject: Re: Hunting spots & Race issues
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve yet to visit Najena.  Is there a good recommendation on how to get through Nek forest without problem besides just using Invisibility?  Can you follow any
ygData.messageBody:
I've yet to visit Najena. Is there a good recommendation on how to get
through Nek forest without problem besides just using Invisibility? Can you
follow any walls to get to the Najena zone?

As to all the comments regarding races:

<roleplay>Bah! Gnomes are the most irreputable and unfriendly little
creatures I've ever met. Little vile knee-biting creatures with an ego
second only in size to their huge heads. :P </roleplay>

Lim'Dul hasn't had too many good experiences with Gnomes. ;)

--Lim'Dul
22 HE Wiz Veeshan


Message: 11
Date: Wed, 30 Jun 1999 22:14:20 -0700
From: Cristie <cristie@...>
Subject: Re: Hunting spots

>Oasis of Marr..either side, water or sand :) lots of orcs or deep water
>crocs/caiman......Lavastorm/Najena, Najena maybe not so solo.... is another
>good spot if you can get through Nektulos forest w/o being KOS ....
